author: Toni Shope
text:
Loudoun County, Virginia is seeking information from other localities to see what policies are in place that address allowable expenses utilizing local tax funding.  This includes all County/city departments and elected officials. Please send responses to Janet Romanchyk, Controller with the Department of Management and Financial Services, Loudoun County, Va. email janet.romanchyk@loudoun.gov. 
Thank you.
title: Local Tax Funding
